description: In this course, I learned how to build complete websites and web apps using Django, Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I explored modern tools like Bootstrap 5 and PostgreSQL, and gained experience with RESTful APIs. I also learned best practices for development, including using Git and GitHub, and customizing my coding environment. With these skills, I can create projects to impress employers and work as a freelance web developer.

In this course, I learned about React and did a deep dive into it, as well as Next.js. I explored modern component frameworks like Material UI and Chakra UI, gaining experience in using REST APIs in the frontend and creating them. I also learned best practices for development, including using Git and GitHub, and completed various projects as assignments.
